name: CKDatabaseSubscription
desc: A subscription that generates push notifications when CloudKit modifies records in a database.

items.name: init(subscriptionID: CKSubscription.ID)
items.desc: Creates a named subscription for all records in a database.

items.name: init(coder: NSCoder)
items.desc: Creates a database subscription from a serialized instance.

items.name: var recordType: CKRecord.RecordType?
items.desc: The type of record that the subscription queries.
